text: فَٱنتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ فَأَغْرَقْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَكَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا غَـٰفِلِينَ

translation.en.sahih: So We took retribution from them, and We drowned them in the sea because they denied Our signs and were heedless of them.
translation.id.indonesian: Kemudian Kami menghukum mereka, maka Kami tenggelamkan mereka di laut disebabkan mereka mendustakan ayat-ayat Kami dan mereka adalah orang-orang yang melalaikan ayat-ayat Kami itu.
